examples: The exam lasted an hour and a half.

definitions.definition: the period of time when a particular activity happens or when a shop or public building is open:
examples: I try to spend my lunch hour walking.

definitions.definition: a particular time during the day or night:
examples: Who could be calling us at this unearthly/ungodly hour (= so late at night)?

definitions.definition: used to describe how many hours in the day you work or what part of the day you work:
examples: She's a nurse so she often works unsocial hours.
I waited for him for hours.

definitions.definition: repeatedly during the day and the night:
examples: They keep calling me at all hours (of the day and night).
